pageControls.searchclick: #header > div:nth-child(2) > div.primary-wrap > div.search-bar > form > button > span

pageControls.productprice: #main-results > div.list-items > div:nth-child(1) > div > div.col-xs-3.list-item-price-column > div > div.list-item-price-content > div.priceblock-wrapper > div.price-block.priceblock-medium > div.pucks-and-price > div

pageControls.productmasterprice: #main-results > div.list-items > div:nth-child(1) > div > div.col-xs-3.list-item-price-column > div > div.list-item-price-content > div.priceblock-wrapper > div.price-block.priceblock-medium > div.pucks-and-price > div.medium-item-price

pageControls.productmasterprice: #tile-container > div:nth-child(x) > div > div > div.tile-primary > div:nth-child(1) > div > span.price.price-display
